Posts.Content: smile2nite wrote: A very good friend of mine has just been diagnosed with stage IV metastatic breast cancer that has spread to the bones (hip, ribs, spine).  She was scheduled for a double mactectomy however this has now been delayed due the the results of a bone scan.  I was just wondering what the prognosis is with this type of cancer?  Thanks for any info you can send me. Smile2nite. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stage IV metastatic breast cancer smile2nite 3rings
